title: evarikai avathaaram
sahitya:
evarikai avatAram ettitivO ipuDaina delupavayyA rAmayya ni



anupallavi



avaniki rammani pilicina mah  rAjevadO vAniki mrokkEda rAma



caraNam



vEda varNa nIyamau nAmamuto vidhi rudrulaku mElmiyagu rUpamutO

    mOda sadanamagu paTu caritamutO munirAja vEsiyau

tyAgarAjanuta ni
